page.title: 18A Junior School Day
page.content: The whistle is blown by the teacher on duty at 8.55 am. We all come inside and start work, though some children come in and start earlier. We have four year groups aged from 7 to 11 years. Every class consists of boys & girls, and most classes have about 25 children in them. Every day our class does{ {Mathematics}and{Reading}, other subjects are{English, Science, {Physical Education and Games, {Swimming, Art and Craft, Topic based {work and Music.}We watch{television {programmes}and listen to a{Radio {Religious Service}. We have three playtimes a day, two are a 1/4 hour each, and at lunchtime we have 1.5 hours.Clubs are{Country Dancing, Gym, {Football, Netball, Recorder Playing, {Stamps, Books, Maths, Chess, {Percussion and Band. }
